idea: So thinking about “How to open a medical store”? Let me tell you this, the pharmacy business is an evergreen business in India that is not affected by economic cycles. So, if one has minimal capital investment and space, the pharmacy store is ideal for many businessmen across India. You can either go for a stand-alone medical store or a pharmacy franchise like Apollo pharmacy franchise, Netmeds franchise, etc which is expensive compared to your own medical store.
name: A.S Enterprises

idea:
To carry on business of mechanical engineers, construction engineers and engineers in all branches of work whatsoever known to

engineering, erectors, mechanics, manufacturers of marine equipment's, and any other kind of machinery which is used for any other

purpose whatsoever and / or any part thereof or accessories thereto; marine engineers, motor engineers, & other instruments used in or in

connection with marine, ship building, oil and gas, machinery and scientific appliances, apparatus and devices of every description

whatsoever, timber goods, iron, steel and other metal implements, tools, utensils and conveniences of every kind and to carry on the

business of ship repairs and re-fitters and vendors of ships, and vessels and or repairers of engines, boilers, machinery and any other parts

required for ships and vessels and to instruct and maintain for the use of the company repairing or docking of ships and other vessels and

to aid in or contribute to the construction of any such works.
name: ORACLE MARINE INDIA PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
RishiRich Jewels designs are timeless classics, often inspired by nature or reflecting a cool modernity.

RishiRich Jewels sources jewelry from around the world. We are always on the lookout for new, unusual, and exciting lines.

RishiRich Jewels is lovingly crafted to the highest standards and yet surprisingly affordable. RishiRich Jewels is very proud of its established Consistent Pricing Policy.

At RishiRich Jewels, we look at every piece of jewelry individually to set a retail price that meets the market. The price you will pay for a RishiRich Jewel piece will always be the very best combination of value, quality, and style.

At the RishiRich Jewels, quality is an area where we strive to maintain the highest of levels. There is no more disappointing feeling than following the excitement of your purchase, finding that the item is faulty in some way.

When selecting new lines we assess for wear-ability, strength, weight, and workmanship.

All safely delivered to your home in beautifully presented boxes.

We have great gifts for everything you want to celebrate - an enduring friendship, a family anniversary, or just a treat for yourself.
name: RishiRich Jewels

idea: Elev8 Brand Identiti Private Limited help companies find insights based on truths. Putting company back in touch with real lives of their consumers. 360degree support for Innovation services, we use our Idea2Launch & Idea Canvas framework, this Product Innovation Framework is our proven process for testing an innovative idea, slashing the risks and seeing it through from prototype to return on investment.
name: ELEV8 BRAND IDENTITI PRIVATE LIMITED
